headline: Mid-America Apartment Communities Weighs RealPage Settlement And Future Pricing Practices
summary: Mid-America Apartment Communities (NYSE:MAA) has agreed to a US$53 million settlement of a class-action lawsuit tied to alleged anticompetitive rent pricing practices involving RealPage software. The settlement, which is subject to court approval and potential opt outs, includes financial payments and commitments affecting future business practices. The case sits within a wider industry focus on data sharing, rent management tools, and operational transparency across multifamily housing...
